channel.title: Relus on Math for Machines
channel.description: Recent content in Relus on Math for Machines

item.title: MFM Journal Club: Permitted and Forbidden Sets in STLNs
item.description: A Model of Associative Memory How memories are encoded in neural matter is still an open question. The name for these supposed neural correlates of memory is “engram”, and papers about engrams tend to have titles like Finding the engram, Catching the Engram, In search of the engram, Continuing the search for the engram, which, though I’m not an expert, makes me feel like the problem isn’t well understood.
